Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text (9 ll.) and Greek docket (3 ll.) on recto and names of 16 witnesses on verso. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Sale of one twentieth of an arura of land in Pathyris by the priests of Hathor to Hor son of Mennes. Scribe. Thotortais son of Nechtminis. Date. year 5 Phamenoth of 7 of Ptol. Philometor = BC. 176 Apr. 8".
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Publication in progress (C.J. Martin and S. Thomas).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (330) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/330)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured Black ink Backed: brown paper (window verso) Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
